article_title: The IRS Would Make a Lousy Tax Preparer

article_metadata.description: VideoMaybe it's the late winter.  If you've noticed an odd absence of a common news meme this April, you're not alone.  This is normally the time of year when breathless liberal columnists come out with articles arguing that the IRS should prepare people's taxes for them.  Just last year, there [...]
article_metadata.author: Ryan Ellis
